script.dialog: Little Robot!    The monsters |wave|really love me!
I feel so loved right now.
This Unit is feeling immense joy for the young Zaraden.
This Unit has also acquired new information for you.
Okay!    I'm listening.
This Unit will now explain |C3|karma.
Monsters will give you |C3|karma|C0| when they are loved.
Having |C3|karma|C0| increases the chance of receiving |C3|higher rank gifts|C0| from monsters.
Having |C3|karma|C0| also increases the chance of having up to four monsters to choose from.
Loving |C3|higher level monsters|C0| will often result in more |C3|karma.
|C3|Suggestion:|C0| Always choose the highest level monster in order to |C3|maximize karma.
That    might be a little too hard to do.
|C3|Update:|C0| It occurs to This Unit that you may not have fully developed your skill yet.
It is true that loving stronger monsters will result in more |C3|karma|C0| and thus |C3|better gifts.
However, loving stronger monsters will also lead to |C3|higher level monsters|C0| in future stages.
Likewise, loving weaker monsters will lead to |C3|lower level monsters|C0| in future stages.
|C3|Suggestion:|C0| Ignore the previous suggestion.
|C3|Revised Suggestion:|C0| Always choose your battles carefully.
So I have control over how tough the battles get?
Precisely.
There is only one thing I have to say about that.
|wave|I love you.
This Unit is beginning to detect a pattern.
